pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Ultimate Repair Strengthening Treatment Mask 300ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The ULTIMATE REPAIR Strengthening Treatment Mask for dry, damaged hair is formulated with LIQUID KERATIN + PEARL EXTRACT to intensively repair and reconstruct the hair with keratin for up to 95% more resistance & shine

Your damaged, dry hair loses keratin over time, resulting in a severely weakened hair structure. It requires an extreme repair care regime to refill these keratin losses.

EXTRA CARE ULTIMATE REPAIR offers:
+ INTENSE RECONSTRUCTION OF HAIR WITH KERATIN
+ UP TO 95% MORE RESISTANCE & SHINE
+ CREAMY TEXTURE & INDULGING CARE

Made In Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Damaged, Dry Hair

Product Claims: Up to 95% more resistance & shine

Size: 300mL

Hair Type: Damaged, Dry Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Extreme Damage Repair
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.

Warnings

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau) · Cetearyl Alcohol · Isopropyl Myristate · Behentrimonium Chloride · Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate · Hydrolyzed Keratin · Hydrolyzed Pearl · Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine · Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride · Isopropyl Alcohol · Citric Acid · Cetyl Palmitate · Glycerin · Dimethicone · Cetrimonium Chloride · Potassium Sorbate · Sorbic Acid · Phenoxyethanol · Methylparaben · Parfum (Fragrance) · Linalool · Limonene · Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

1. Use before shampooing & conditioning for LIGHTER RESULTS
2. Use after shampooing & conditioning for INTENSIVE RESULTS
Massage gently into hair, then leave in for 2-3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. Use 2-3 times per week.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Jar & Lid are Kerbside Recyclable. Jar & Lid can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 5 PP
